context_bundle.summary: Input sanitization & validation per OWASP 2024 standards. Allowlisting (recommended) over denylisting. Validate syntactic + semantic levels. Multi-layer defense (client + server). Prevent SQL injection, XSS, path traversal.

onboarding.quick_start: Allowlist: Define permitted inputs, reject all else. Validate early in data flow. Multi-layer: Client + server. Syntactic: Format checks. Semantic: Business logic checks. Canonicalize paths, strip dangerous chars.
common_patterns: Type validation: Ensure int is int, not string

known_errors.cause: Using denylisting or missing edge case
known_errors.solution: Use parameterized queries (primary defense), allowlisting as secondary
known_errors.prevention: Never trust input, validate AND use safe APIs
